item.description: About Serverless version of ECS. Serverless compute for contaiÂ­ners. AWS Fargate is a serverless, pay-as-you-go compute engine that lets you focus on building applications without managing servers. Deploy and manage your applications, not infrastructure. Fargate removes the operational overhead of scaling, patching, securing, and managing servers. Compatible with both Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) and Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS).
